page.title: 11Schools in St Davids (1)
page.content: You start playgroup at the age of 3 years old.There you paint,play with sand,dress up,play on slides and things like that.The people who run it are Mrs.Edwards and Mrs.Jones.The playgroup has been run by them for about 3 or 4 years.You leave playgroup at the age of 4 years,then you can go to the Nursery in the C.P.School.(County Primary School .You start to get to know other children there and learn to read and write your own name.There are toys there for you to play with.The person who runs it is called Mrs.Davis and it has been going for about 5 years.After Nursery at 5 years old,you have a choice of either going to the C.P. School or the Church in Wales School(V.A.).In both schools there are infant and junior parts.
